attributes.action: MPs should be subject to a 25% pay and expenses cut to ensure that we are ALL in this together!
attributes.additional_details: To ensure that we are ALL "in this together" and to ensure that the public sees this, we should ensure that all MPs and Senior Civil Servants have their remuneration and expenses cut by 25%.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: We are taking cuts, so should MPs

Created by: Carmel Harrison

Closing: 04/11/2014
